ovdesc.p: This file contains all the relevant details necessary to process a stock dividend, stock split type transaction within the securities module.

The conditions relating to each transaction are entered within this file and it enables the system to calculate 'balances' due to each customer with a holding in the specified security as at an 'extraction' date.

The sub-system allows the ratios and/or percentages value dates, commissions and any foreign charges passed on by the depository concerned. It enables the user to update a separate security suffix position should the transaction necessitate this; where for example the new or bonus shares do not rank equally along with the old shares. Advices are produced and financial entries passed.
